description:
A Nightmare on Elm Street {release date: Nov 1999, size: 3.5 MB}

-DESCRIPTION UNDER CONSTRUCTION-

This was the last game I finished back in the day before I disappeared for a while. Probably the most challenging out of the horror games I made. Control Freddy using the arrow keys & space bar.
